Perfect! My changes are:

1. ✅ Added `detect_chip_from_sdkconfig()` static method to ESP32Profile
2. ✅ Added `detect_esp_idf_project()` static method to ESP32Profile (replaces old stub)
3. ✅ Created new test file `test_esp32_project_detect.py` with 23 tests
4. ✅ Updated existing test file `test_esp32_project_flash.py` to work with new dict API

All changes are source code and tests that belong permanently in the codebase. The results directory contains the summary document. Everything is good!
